[`Workspace`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace.md)

## Workspace class


**Signature:**

```typescript
export class Workspace extends Events 
```
**Extends:** [`Events`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Events.md)

To react to the layout becoming ready, use [Workspace.onLayoutReady()](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/onLayoutReady.md) |

|  [`duplicateLeaf(leaf, direction)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/duplicateLeaf.md) |  |  |
|  [`duplicateLeaf(leaf, leafType, direction)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/duplicateLeaf_1.md) |  |  |
|  [`ensureSideLeaf(type, side, options)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/ensureSideLeaf.md) |  | Get side leaf or create one if one does not exist. |
|  [`getActiveFile()`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getActiveFile.md) |  | Returns the file for the current view if it's a <code>FileView</code>. Otherwise, it will return the most recently active file. |
|  [`getActiveViewOfType(type)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getActiveViewOfType.md) |  | Get the currently active view of a given type. |
|  [`getGroupLeaves(group)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getGroupLeaves.md) |  | Get all leaves that belong to a group |
|  [`getLastOpenFiles()`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getLastOpenFiles.md) |  | Get the filenames of the 10 most recently opened files. |
|  [`getLayout()`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getLayout.md) |  |  |
|  [`getLeaf(newLeaf, direction)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getLeaf('split').md) |  | Creates a new leaf in a leaf adjacent to the currently active leaf. If direction is <code>'vertical'</code>, the leaf will appear to the right. If direction is <code>'horizontal'</code>, the leaf will appear below the current leaf. |
|  [`getLeaf(newLeaf)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getLeaf_1.md) |  | <p>If newLeaf is false (or not set) then an existing leaf which can be navigated is returned, or a new leaf will be created if there was no leaf available.</p><p>If newLeaf is <code>'tab'</code> or <code>true</code> then a new leaf will be created in the preferred location within the root split and returned.</p><p>If newLeaf is <code>'split'</code> then a new leaf will be created adjacent to the currently active leaf.</p><p>If newLeaf is <code>'window'</code> then a popout window will be created with a new leaf inside.</p> |
|  [`getLeafById(id)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getLeafById.md) |  | Retrieve a leaf by its id. |
|  [`getLeavesOfType(viewType)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getLeavesOfType.md) |  | Get all leaves of a given type. |
|  [`getLeftLeaf(split)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getLeftLeaf.md) |  | Create a new leaf inside the left sidebar. |
|  [`getMostRecentLeaf(root)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getMostRecentLeaf.md) |  | Get the most recently active leaf in a given workspace root. Useful for interacting with the leaf in the root split while a sidebar leaf might be active. |
|  [`getRightLeaf(split)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getRightLeaf.md) |  | Create a new leaf inside the right sidebar. |
|  [`getUnpinnedLeaf()`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/getUnpinnedLeaf.md) |  |  |
|  [`iterateAllLeaves(callback)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/iterateAllLeaves.md) |  | Iterate through all leaves, including main area leaves, floating leaves, and sidebar leaves. |
|  [`iterateRootLeaves(callback)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/iterateRootLeaves.md) |  | Iterate through all leaves in the main area of the workspace. |
|  [`moveLeafToPopout(leaf, data)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/moveLeafToPopout.md) |  | Migrates this leaf to a new popout window. Only works on the desktop app. |
|  [`off(name, callback)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Events/off.md) |  | <p>(Inherited from [Events](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Events.md)<!-- -->)</p> |
|  [`offref(ref)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Events/offref.md) |  | <p>(Inherited from [Events](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Events.md)<!-- -->)</p> |
|  [`on(name: 'quick-preview', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('quick-preview').md) |  | Triggered when the active Markdown file is modified. React to file changes before they are saved to disk. |
|  [`on(name: 'files-menu', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('files-menu').md) |  | Triggered when the user opens the context menu with multiple files selected in the File Explorer. |
|  [`on(name: 'url-menu', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('url-menu').md) |  | Triggered when the user opens the context menu on an external URL. |
|  [`on(name: 'editor-menu', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('editor-menu').md) |  | Triggered when the user opens the context menu on an editor. |
|  [`on(name: 'editor-change', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('editor-change').md) |  | Triggered when changes to an editor has been applied, either programmatically or from a user event. |
|  [`on(name: 'editor-paste', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('editor-paste').md) |  | Triggered when the editor receives a paste event. Check for <code>evt.defaultPrevented</code> before attempting to handle this event, and return if it has been already handled. Use <code>evt.preventDefault()</code> to indicate that you've handled the event. |
|  [`on(name: 'editor-drop', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('editor-drop').md) |  | Triggered when the editor receives a drop event. Check for <code>evt.defaultPrevented</code> before attempting to handle this event, and return if it has been already handled. Use <code>evt.preventDefault()</code> to indicate that you've handled the event. |
|  [`on(name: 'quit', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('quit').md) |  | Triggered when the app is about to quit. Not guaranteed to actually run. Perform some best effort cleanup here. |
|  [`on(name: 'resize', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('resize').md) |  | Triggered when a <code>WorkspaceItem</code> is resized or the workspace layout has changed. |
|  [`on(name: 'active-leaf-change', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('active-leaf-change').md) |  | Triggered when the active leaf changes. |
|  [`on(name: 'file-open', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('file-open').md) |  | Triggered when the active file changes. The file could be in a new leaf, an existing leaf, or an embed. |
|  [`on(name: 'layout-change', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('layout-change').md) |  |  |
|  [`on(name: 'window-open', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('window-open').md) |  | Triggered when a new popout window is created. |
|  [`on(name: 'window-close', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('window-close').md) |  | Triggered when a popout window is closed. |
|  [`on(name: 'css-change', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('css-change').md) |  | Triggered when the CSS of the app has changed. |
|  [`on(name: 'file-menu', callback, ctx)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/on('file-menu').md) |  | Triggered when the user opens the context menu on a file. |
|  [`onLayoutReady(callback)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/onLayoutReady.md) |  | Runs the callback function right away if layout is already ready, or push it to a queue to be called later when layout is ready. |
|  [`openLinkText(linktext, sourcePath, newLeaf, openViewState)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/openLinkText.md) |  |  |
|  [`openPopoutLeaf(data)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/openPopoutLeaf.md) |  | Open a new popout window with a single new leaf and return that leaf. Only works on the desktop app. |
|  [`revealLeaf(leaf)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/revealLeaf.md) |  | Bring a given leaf to the foreground. If the leaf is in a sidebar, the sidebar will be uncollapsed. <code>await</code> this function to ensure your view has been fully loaded and is not deferred. |
|  [`setActiveLeaf(leaf, params)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/setActiveLeaf.md) |  | Sets the active leaf |
|  [`setActiveLeaf(leaf, pushHistory, focus)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/setActiveLeaf_1.md) |  |  |
|  [`splitActiveLeaf(direction)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/splitActiveLeaf.md) |  |  |

|  [`tryTrigger(evt, args)`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Events/tryTrigger.md) |  | <p>(Inherited from [Events](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Events.md)<!-- -->)</p> |
|  [`updateOptions()`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Workspace/updateOptions.md) |  | Calling this function will update/reconfigure the options of all Markdown views. It is fairly expensive, so it should not be called frequently. |
